body_html:
Hi @aselle @sampepose, I added --cxxopt="-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0" both on tensorflow and zero_out custom op compilation command (bazel build --config=opt --cxxopt="-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0" ...", then it works well.

Many thanks for your help!

BR,
Baptiste.
body_text:
Hi @aselle  @sampepose, I added --cxxopt="-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0" both on tensorflow and zero_out custom op compilation command (bazel build --config=opt  --cxxopt="-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0" ...", then it works well.
Many thanks for your help!
BR,
Baptiste.
body:
Hi @aselle  @sampepose, I added --cxxopt="-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0" both on tensorflow and zero_out custom op compilation command (bazel build --config=opt  --cxxopt="-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0" ...", then it works well.

Many thanks for your help!

BR,
Baptiste.
